name: ToastMe
0:
”Alexa, toast me”
”Alexa, ask toast me for a toast”
”Alexa, get a toast from toast me”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toast me
des: Alexa will toast to your health, happiness, and good cheer. Toasts are short, classy, and tend to rhyme. For example: "Prost", "May all your joys be pure joys, and all your pain champagne.", "May your luck ever spread, like jelly on bread".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
